EmailTemplate.name: Touching Base with Existing Client
EmailTemplate.subject: VinSolutions Utilization Review
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{!Account.Name}{!Account.AccountNumber}{!POA__c.Dealer__c}
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
One of my duties as your VinPro is to proactively review your account every 30-60 days, and provide you with valuable information regarding utilization of your VinSolutions ILM/CRM software. These efforts are focused on ensuring your continued success with VinSolutions.
I've reviewed the items below and found some opportunity for improvement:
Completion of Daily Tasks (Overdue Task Count)
Open Support Tickets (Important if they have 10 or more open)
Appointments are being set and confirmed daily
Inventory Updated (Important if there are no new vehicles in the past 7 days)
Open Showroom Visits (Excluding showroom visits from Enter Today's Date)
Updating the Sold Log (Important if the vast majority of deals are still in Pending status)
Completion of DMS to CRM Sales Customer Matching (Important if more than 20 need matched)
Participation in Online Training (Important if less than 10% of user have completed training)
Sales and Service Processes performing as configured
Report: "Active Leads with No Future Follow up"
Sales/Service/Parts Internet Leads with no contact
Response Times Goals
Leads Goal 1 %: Leads Goal 2 % : Leads Missed %:
Reports > CRM > Activity Details > Activity shows that your dealership staff is logging (Incoming and outgoing) calls regularly into the system (Based on Month-To-Date Review)
Review Recap Notes: ***Input your Recap notes here***
Opportunity for Improvement:: ***Input Your Recommendation and Suggestions for continued success and improvement***
Please let me know if you have any questions and I look forward to speaking with you soon.
Sincerely,
{!User.Name}
{!User.Title}
Office: {!User.Phone} x {!User.Extension}
Mobile: {!User.MobilePhone}
{!User.Email}
We are always striving to improve our product and customer
service. To reach this goal of excellence, we would love to hear
from you! Please submit feedback of your experience, positive
or negative, at VinCares@vinsolutions.com.
